episodes.title: Becoming Justin: Life After Leaving A Cult (Join My Journey)
episodes.description:
I made the life-changing decision to leave a cult, and now I’m on a mission to live life freely and fearlessly. Coming out as gay and leaving the Jehovah's Witness religion, I’ve faced my share of challenges, including losing all my family in the process. But through it all, I’ve found strength in embracing who I am and living life on my own terms.

But this isn’t just my journey—it’s OURS! I want you to be a part of it. Join me as I explore new places, dive into crazy adventures, and learn new skills I never thought possible. From skydiving to cooking classes, I’m embracing every moment of this newfound freedom. And I want YOU to help shape this adventure! Share something that brings you joy! Got an idea for something wild, fun, or totally outside my comfort zone? Drop your recommendations in the comments—I’m ready to take on your challenges and make them part of this journey.

Subscribe and be a part of my journey. This is me, Becoming Justin. 

Check out my videos where I share my story:
"Why I left Jehovah's Witnesses" PART ONE
https://youtu.be/hwaQeXXuPRg?si=opsbbhSitG4pYnBh

"Why I left Jehovah's Witnesses" PART TWO
https://youtu.be/2Z64_i9cj6I?si=mbqFoyO3UWC1qtSi

"Why I left Jehovah's Witnesses" UPDATES
https://youtu.be/S_KZJYgPMwM?si=fmWATwjdsHlRTVgT

#exjw #jehovahswitnesses #vlog #vlogs #cultsandextremebeliefs #gay #startingover #family #vlogger  #comingoutstory #newadventures #lifeafterloss #love #family #tryguys

episodes.title: Why I Left Jehovah's Witnesses: Updates (How The Religious Cult Responded To My Initial Video)
episodes.description:
HEY YALL!!!!! I just want to start by saying thank you—thank you for all the love and support you’ve shown since I released those first two videos telling my truth about why I left the Jehovah's Witness religious cult. If you missed them check it out here:

Why I Left Jehovah's Witnesses: PART ONE
https://youtu.be/hwaQeXXuPRg?si=x1tM8d05sz6_Ovat

Why I Left Jehovah's Witnesses: PART TWO
https://youtu.be/2Z64_i9cj6I?si=I5Xa0cJ-z6SwzP9R

Honestly, I never could have imagined the amount of encouragement and love I've received. It’s been overwhelming in the best way possible. I feel like I’ve found a new family in all of you—one that lifts me up, supports my truth, and encourages me to keep going. Your messages, comments, and love mean the world to me.

**** SO WHAT HAS HAPPENED SINCE I RELEASED THOSE FIRST TWO VIDEOS****
Since I released those videos, I’ve been getting calls, texts, and even voicemails from people within the Jehovah’s Witness religion threatening, harassing me and demanding that I “explain myself.” They’re trying to silence me and ban me from speaking my truth. It hasn’t been easy, but if anything, this only makes me more determined to keep sharing my story. My voice will not be silenced. I’m living my truth, and I’ll continue to do so fearlessly.

*** I STILL NEED YOUR HELP***
I didn’t get to try many things while I was in the cult, but now, the possibilities feel endless. And that’s where YOU come in. I want you to help shape this journey! Drop your suggestions for new adventures, challenges, or experiences in the comments—whether it’s skydiving, cooking, or something totally outside my comfort zone. Let’s make this journey ours together.

Thank you again for being part of my new chapter, and if you haven’t already, don’t forget to subscribe and hit the notification bell. There’s so much more to come, and I’m so grateful to have you with me on this adventure.

Welcome to Becoming Justin—and here’s to living our truth, together.

Timestamps
0:00:00 - Intro 
0:02:00 – Thank You for the Love & Support
0:06:53 – What Happened Since I Released my "Why I Left Jehovah Witnesses" Video
0:09:08 –  Jehovah’s Witness Began To Harass Me
0:09:25 – They Called To Disfellowship Me Over The Phone (Part 1)
0:11:12 – I Was Reported / No Natural Affection
0:15:14 – The Religion Supports My Parents Actions to Abandon Me
0:17:16 – Helping Others Live Freely / New Family
0:17:53 – They Called To Disfellowship Me Over The Phone (Part 2)
00:20:44 – "I Feel Like I'm Being Hunted"
0:22:00 – Further Confirmation THIS IS A CULT
00:22:37 – Positivity / Unconditional Love
0:24:27 – We Are All In This Together
00:25:24– New Beginnings & Join My Journey
00:27:16– I Am BECOMING JUSTIN

#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #cult #atheism #atheist #deconstruction #jehovahswitness #deconversion #gay #comingoutstory #lgbt #lifeafterloss

episodes.title: Escaping a Cult: My Truth About Leaving Jehovah’s Witnesses (PART ONE)
episodes.description:
Welcome to my very first video on Becoming Justin! Honestly, I’m nervous—sharing this part of my life is terrifying, but it’s a story I need to tell. In this video, I’m opening up about one of the hardest decisions I’ve ever made: leaving the Jehovah's Witness religion, coming out as gay and embracing my true self. It wasn’t an easy journey, and in the process, I lost my family and community, but I gained something invaluable: the freedom to live authentically. 

In this two-part video, I’ll share my story of breaking away from a life that once confined me and how I’m now building a future full of self-love, new experiences, and bold adventures. Whether you’ve been in a similar situation or are just here to learn, I hope my story inspires you to live fearlessly and unapologetically.

**I NEED YOUR HELP**
I want YOU to help me shape this new journey! I didn’t get to try many things while I was in the cult, but now, the possibilities feel endless. I’m inviting YOU to suggest new adventures, challenges, or experiences—whether it’s skydiving, cooking, or something wild and outside my comfort zone. Drop your ideas in the comments, and let’s make this journey ours!

Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the notification bell to be part of my adventure. Welcome to Becoming Justin!

FOLLOW ME 
► Instagram: / becomingjustin
► Tik Tok: / becomingjustin
► Website: https://www.fordpublishinghouse.com

Let's connect: justinbecoming@gmail.com

**PART ONE**

Timestamps
0:00:00 - Intro 
0:02:23 – Becoming Justin 
0:06:16 – About Jehovah’s Witnesses
0:09:15 – Growing Up As A Jehovah’s Witness (Ministerial Servant & Pioneer)
0:17:39 – "US vs THEM" Mentality 
0:25:31 – Realizing I Was Gay 
0:30:57 – Fear Of Punishment (Disfellowshipping)
00:35:26 – Dating, Becoming Unhappy & “Having a “Girlfriend” 
0:38:25 – Discouraged Higher Education & Information Control 
00:46:16 – Critical Thinking & Having Doubts and Questioning Faith
00:50:24 – The Pandemic & “Beginning to WAKE UP”
00:57:33 – Suicidal Thoughts & Accepting Being Gay
01:05:54 – My Three Options 
01:06:44 – Embracing my Authenticity  
01:08:05 – Deciding To Leave The Religion 

Don't miss PART TWO, where I delve into my decision to come out as gay, officially leave the Jehovah's Witness religion, and the challenges of losing my entire community and support system. Join me as I discover my authentic self and begin living life to the fullest.

 #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #cult #atheism #atheist #deconstruction #jehovahswitness #deconversion #gay #comingoutstory #lgbt #lifeafterloss #challengeaccepted

episodes.title: Welcome To Becoming Justin
episodes.description:
A couple of years ago, I made the life-changing decision to leave a cult, and now I’m on a mission to live life freely and fearlessly. Coming out as gay and leaving the Jehovah's Witness religion, I’ve faced my share of challenges, including losing all my family in the process. But through it all, I’ve found strength in embracing who I am and living life on my own terms.

But this isn’t just my journey—it’s ours! I want you to be a part of it. Join me as I explore new places, dive into crazy adventures, and learn new skills I never thought possible. From skydiving to cooking classes, I’m embracing every moment of this newfound freedom. And I want YOU to help shape this adventure! Got an idea for something wild, fun, or totally outside my comfort zone? Drop your recommendations in the comments—I’m ready to take on your challenges and make them part of this journey.
